analysis.description:
MeeTipCrowdsale.updateRate (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#538-546) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Crowdsale.rate

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#97-102)

MeeTipCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#513-538) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#530)

MeeTipCrowdsale.MeeTipCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#457-507) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(foundersWallet,1500000 * (10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#501-503)
	-token.mint(bountyWallet,1500000 * (10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#504-507)

MeeTip.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#431)
MeeTip.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x1cce4079a9c65920390ea38d5ffbeeb3f4aaab77.sol#429-430)
